name: CUST_SERV_ATCHMENT
description: Extracts the attachments for this NCS (customer service) record.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the customer service communication record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant that this attachment line was added to the customer service communication record.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The attachment type category ID for the customer service communication attachment.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_PT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient encounter that is attached to the customer service communication.  This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ATCHMENT_SER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_EMP_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employer group record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_EMP_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: ATCHMENT_VEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the vendor record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_VEN_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_MCR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the carrier record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_MCR_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_REF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_CLM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_NET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the network record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_NET_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_PBA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_EAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_NCS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the customer service communication record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The attachment reason category ID for the customer service communication attachment.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_RSN_CMT
columns.description: The attachment reason comment for the customer service communication attachment.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_HAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_PROG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the program record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code that was associated with the attachment when it was added to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_PROSPECT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the prospective patient record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_CAMPAIGN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the campaign record that is attached to a customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_CAMPAIGN_ID_CAMPAIGN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the campaign record.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Stores relevant order records for this NCS record.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the estimate record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document record that is attached to this customer service communication line.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_CLAIM_RECON_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the rejected claim record that is attached to the customer service communication.

columns.name: ATCHMENT_RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study record that is attached to the customer service communication.
